ThingDef.label: the Norn Crown
ThingDef.description: Despite the name, the Norn Crown is actually a writhing mass of psychically tuned flesh. Implanted in the sternum, it allows the user to influence the moods of beings around them.

ThingDef.label: reactive shimmerworms
ThingDef.description: Once these worms feel pain, they immediately make themselves psychically invisible to anyone around them. By melding their nervous system with the hosts, these worms cause the host to go invisible whenever the host feels pain.
